title: System Administrator
content:
Two Six Technologies is growing, and we are looking for a System Administrator to support our Corporate team. You will be responsible for assisting the Information System Security Manager in ensuring compliance for assigned classified programs. The ideal candidate is one who is eager to learn and adapt to new challenges in a fast-paced and growing environment, have great attention to detail, strong analytical and critical problem-solving abilities, and excellent communication skills. The environments you will work in include Windows 10/11, Active Directory/Group Policy, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), Ubuntu Linux, ProxMox, VMWare vSphere / ESXi, etc. 
The position will be based out of our Herndon, VA office with potential local travel to our other sites.
What You Will Do:

Architecting and engineering Information Systems for both unclassified and classified use
Install, configure, design, administer and maintain Linux and Windows servers or workstations
Administering user accounts and access control within information systems to include creation of user accounts, assigning permissions to accounts, and enforcing security access policies to ensure compliance
Troubleshooting and resolving technical issues
Perform system backups and data recovery

What You Will Need:

Active TS/SCI with Poly
3+ years of experience working within a classified environment as a System Administrator
Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, Information Security, or related degrees or an advanced professional industry certifications can be substituted
Required to have an 8140 certification such as Security+, GCISP, GSEC, SSCP, CASP+, CISM, CISSP, etc.  
Working knowledge of tools such as ServiceNow and Talon
Working knowledge of government regulations such as the DCSA Assessment and Authorization Process Manual (DAAPM), NIST SP 800-53, NIST SP 800-171, etc. 
Basic understanding of security compliance matrix

What We Would Like:

Operating System certifications such as LPIC, Linux+, RHCSA, Microsoft Administrator certifications, etc. 
Working knowledge of Windows environment

Security Clearance needed:

Active TS/SCI with Poly


Two Six Technologies is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices based on race (including traits historically associated with race, such as hair texture, hair type and protective hair styles (e.g., braids, twists, locs and twists)), color, religion, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions and lactation), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age (40 and over), marital status, disability, genetic information, and protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law. 
If you are an individual with a disability and would like to request reasonable workplace accommodation for any part of our employment process, please send an email to accomodations@twosixtech.com. Information provided will be kept confidential and used only to the extent required to provide needed reasonable accommodations.
Additionally, please be advised that this business uses E-Verify in its hiring practices.
EOE, including disability/vets. 
By submitting the following application, I hereby certify that to the best of my knowledge, the information provided is true and accurate.
